name: OT Payment Report
query:
SELECT
  view_ot_hour.name,
  view_ot_hour.employee,
  view_ot_hour.employee_name,
  view_ot_hour.working_hours,
  view_ot_hour.status,
  view_ot_hour.department,
  view_ot_hour.shift,
  view_ot_hour.attendance_date,
  view_ot_hour.base as gross,
 view_ot_hour.ot_time,
HOUR(ot_time) AS ot_hour,
  minute(ot_time) AS ot_minute,

  ROUND( minute(ot_time)/45,0) AS ot_minute_round,
  (HOUR(ot_time) +  ROUND( minute(ot_time)/45,0)) AS total_ot_hour,

ROUND(((BASE-1800)/1.5)/104,2) AS ot_rate,
   
 round((HOUR(ot_time) +  ROUND( minute(ot_time)/45,0))*(((BASE-1800)/1.5)/104),0) as ot_amount
FROM view_ot_hour
where 
 view_ot_hour.attendance_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
